misc.res_desc: In the quiet village of Ravenswood Bluff, ‌a demon walks amongst you...

gameplay.role_dm: ***{user}***, your character is the **{role_name_str}**. You are in the **{category_str}** category, on the **{team_str}** team. Type `{prefix}role {role_name_str}` to read your character guide.
gameplay.blocked: {} You have either blocked me, or have not enabled direct messages from server members.
gameplay.lobby_game_start:
{} Welcome to **𝕭𝖑𝖔𝖔𝖉 𝖔𝖓 𝖙𝖍𝖊 𝕮𝖑𝖔𝖈𝖐𝖙𝖔𝖜𝖊𝖗 (𝕭𝖔𝕿𝕮)**, played using the **{}** Edition with **{}** players.

*𝐈𝐧 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐪𝐮𝐢𝐞𝐭 𝐯𝐢𝐥𝐥𝐚𝐠𝐞 𝐨𝐟 𝐑𝐚𝐯𝐞𝐧𝐬𝐰𝐨𝐨𝐝 𝐁𝐥𝐮𝐟𝐟, ‌𝐨𝐧 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐬𝐭𝐫𝐨𝐤𝐞 𝐨𝐟 𝐦𝐢𝐝𝐧𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭, 𝐭𝐡𝐞𝐫𝐞 𝐞𝐜𝐡𝐨𝐞𝐬 𝐚 𝐛𝐨𝐧𝐞-𝐜𝐡𝐢𝐥𝐥𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐬𝐜𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐦. 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐭𝐨𝐰𝐧𝐬𝐟𝐨𝐥𝐤 𝐫𝐮𝐬𝐡 𝐭𝐨 𝐢𝐧𝐯𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐢𝐠𝐚𝐭𝐞 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐟𝐢𝐧𝐝 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐭𝐨𝐰𝐧 𝐬𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐲𝐭𝐞𝐥𝐥𝐞𝐫 𝐦𝐮𝐫𝐝𝐞𝐫𝐞𝐝, 𝐭𝐡𝐞𝐢𝐫 𝐛𝐨𝐝𝐲 𝐢𝐦𝐩𝐚𝐥𝐞𝐝 𝐨𝐧 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐡𝐚𝐧𝐝𝐬 𝐨𝐟 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐜𝐥𝐨𝐜𝐤𝐭𝐨𝐰𝐞𝐫.*

*𝐖𝐢𝐥𝐥 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐠𝐨𝐨𝐝 𝐭𝐨𝐰𝐧𝐬𝐟𝐨𝐥𝐤 𝐩𝐮𝐭 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐩𝐮𝐳𝐳𝐥𝐞 𝐭𝐨𝐠𝐞𝐭𝐡𝐞𝐫 𝐢𝐧 𝐭𝐢𝐦𝐞 𝐭𝐨 𝐞𝐱𝐞𝐜𝐮𝐭𝐞 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐭𝐫𝐮𝐞 𝐝𝐞𝐦𝐨𝐧? 𝐎𝐫 𝐰𝐢𝐥𝐥 𝐞𝐯𝐢𝐥 𝐨𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐫𝐮𝐧 𝐭𝐡𝐢𝐬 𝐨𝐧𝐜𝐞 𝐩𝐞𝐚𝐜𝐞𝐟𝐮𝐥 𝐯𝐢𝐥𝐥𝐚𝐠𝐞?*

Please review the rules of the game before you start. All players should now have received a DM from me for private instructions.
_ _

gameplay.tb_lore: *Clouds roll in over Ravenswood Bluff, engulfing this sleepy town and its superstitious inhabitants in foreboding shadow. Anxious mothers call their children home from play, as thunder begins to clap on the horizon. Those who can read the signs know there is...* ***Trouble Brewing***.

cmd_warnings.dm_only: {} {} You may not use this command outside of DM channel.
cmd_warnings.lobby_only: {} {} You may not use this command outside of the public lobby channel.
cmd_warnings.alive_only: {} {} You may not use this command while dead.
cmd_warnings.dead_only: {} {} You may not use this command while alive.
cmd_warnings.day_only: {} {} You may not use this command during nighttime.
cmd_warnings.night_only: {} {} You may not use this command during daytime.
cmd_warnings.target_nb: {} {} You must choose exactly **{}** target{} for your ability. Note that the separator `and` is a special keyword and allows you to input multiple targets.

serve.help: The bot recognizes usernames, nicknames, user ID's and discriminators. If your role allows for multiple targets, use 'and' to separate each of them. Please use the command in DM.
serve.feedback: You have decided to serve **{}** as your master.
